descriptive.question: Where is the [toothbrush_1]?
answer: [toothbrush_1] is wearing a white shirt and tie.
The white bucket is placed on [toothbrush_1].

explanatory.question: Why is [person_1] brushing something on the table?
answer: [person_1] is moving his arms to the left and to then to the right.
[person_1] is moving the arms up and down , left to right.
[person_1] is standing a little lower than the ground.

predictive.question: What is [person_1] going to do?
answer: [person_1] is going to keep moving the tool in his hands.
reason: [person_1]'s hands are still holding the tool and keep moving continuously.

counterfactual.question: What would [person_1] do if [person_1] didn't sit on the chair?
answer: [person_1] could fold clothes on the table.
reason: Nobody comes to [person_1] to help him out , so he just has to stare at the floor and let his mind wander.
It takes [person_1] a certain amount of time to finish the work.
